subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4.0 and Maven 2
msgSnippet: Sounds like a Maven question to me. ;-) Maven Users List  I believe at this point, the Maven Surefire plugin does not support JUnit 4.0
messageBody:
Sounds like a Maven question to me. ;-)
Maven Users List <users@...>

I believe at this point, the Maven Surefire plugin does not support
JUnit 4.0 tests, only 3.x. I believe JUnit4 support is on the "to do"
list for Surefire, its just not complete yet.

Wayne


On 3/21/06, nokyyz <nokyyz@...> wrote:
> Hello,
>
> I'm using the release 4.0 of JUnit. It's great :-) !
>
> My tests run very well in Eclipse but in Maven 2.x these tests fail
> with Surefire 1.5.2 plugin.
>
> Example :
>
> T E S T S
> -------------------------------------------------------
> [surefire] Running CustomerTest
> [surefire] Tests run: 2, Failures: 2, Errors: 0, Time elapsed: 0,042
> sec <<<<<<<< FAILURE !!
>
>
> Have you a solution ?
>
> Thx
>
>
>

>
